replies.body:
Hmm, he's rather different to the other champions that you play but he is worth trying out. I picked him up as my second main marksman and imo he rewards aggressive play in lane if you synergize well with a playmaking support.
He's a cool mix of Marksman and Mage in that his damage output is increased greatly by how consistently you chain his spells and auto's while staying alive, so perhaps he would feel similar to Ezreal for you.
